Header: The final rites of the late Srima Dissanayake today
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) –  The final rites of the late Srima Dissanayake was held today (April 01). The wife of one of the most prominent political figures in Sri Lanka passed away at a private hospital last Friday (March 29). Srima Dissanayake, is the mother of Minister Naveen Dissanayake , MP Mayantha Dissanayake and Varuni Dissanayake. President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe paid their last respects to the deceased yesterday(March 31). The funeral was held at the Borella public cemetery.
